name: Misfit, The Christmas Elf Torturer (VIC-20)
description:
Misfit, The Christmas Elf Torturer is a Christmas game for unexpanded VIC-20 (PAL only because I didn't have enough time and space).

The whole game is implemented between 11.12 and 23.12.2019

Story:
You control our hero the Misfit and your mission is to torture those annoying Christmas elves. Collect snow, choose direction and throw snowballs. Torture those bastards and steal their presents.
